articles.title: By going global, local brands show quality matters the most
articles.author: ZHANG XI
articles.summary: Chagee, a leading Chinese premium tea beverage brand, debuted on the Nasdaq Stock Market in April. This reflects the rising presence of Chinese brands and their products in overseas markets.

articles.title: New Online Discount Site Offering Major Markdowns on Everyday Items
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: LJ Discounts launched on July 3, 2025, as a new online retail superstore. It aims to provide everyday and luxury goods at discounted prices. The company offers products across appliances, furniture, apparel, and accessories.

articles.title: Playmobil Future Plans: New Products & Brand Vision 2028
articles.summary: Playmobil is investing in startups like Kekz® to integrate new play experiences. The company's vision for 2028 focuses on product diversification, digital integration through augmented reality, and sustainability by using environmentally friendly manufacturing processes. These strategies involve expanding product lines and exploring licenses from popular media, signaling an adaptation to the evolving toy market.

articles.title: Henkel unveils new product
articles.author: Arinze Nwafor
articles.summary: Henkel Nigeria has introduced two new products, WAW Complete 5 in 1 Liquid Detergent and WAW Active 5 All-Purpose Cleaner, to the Nigerian market. These products are designed to meet local cleaning needs, offering convenience, fabric protection, deep cleaning, and stain removal. The launch reflects Henkel Nigeria's commitment to innovation and providing solutions tailored to evolving consumer habits.

articles.title: 3i Announces Prime Day 2025 Sale with Major Savings on Flagship and All-New Robot Vacuums  Jul. 3, 2025 23:00
articles.summary: 3i is launching Prime Day offers from July 8-11 for its robot vacuum and mop models, including the 3i S10 Ultra, 3i P10 Ultra, and the newly released 3i G10+. The 3i S10 Ultra features WaterRecycle™ technology, while the 3i P10 Ultra offers deep cleaning with a focus on value, and the 3i G10+ provides smart cleaning in a compact design with onboard debris compression.

articles.title: Squarespace's Blueprint AI and design intelligence are making websites human again
articles.summary: Squarespace has launched Blueprint AI and the Design Intelligence suite, AI-powered tools integrated into its platform to simplify website creation. Blueprint AI generates multi-page websites from user prompts, while Design Intelligence offers features like Site Themes, Layout Switcher, and AI Writer to enhance design and content creation. These tools aim to streamline the design process, making it faster and more accessible for users.

articles.title: This Dyson vacuum deal is too good to wait for Prime Day — save $170 right now
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: Amazon is offering early Prime Day deals, including a discount on the Dyson V11 Origins Cordless Vacuum, reduced from $570 to $400, and the DASH Deluxe Shave Ice and Slushie Maker at a 20% discount, selling for $32. These deals are time-sensitive and available for a limited time.

articles.title: Walmart finally has this TikTok-famous ice cream maker on sale; best deal of the summer for DIY dessert fans
articles.author: Rachel Sandstrom Morrison
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the Ninja Creami, a device that turns frozen bases into creamy desserts, for $169, a discount from its usual price of $199. The Ninja Creami features five modes including ice cream, sorbet, and milkshake, and it allows users to create various desserts from protein shakes to custards.

articles.title: 30 Irresponsible Things You Can Buy As An Adult
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Amazon offers a variety of new and novelty products, including Mystical Flames to color campfires, a Lego cherry blossom kit for home decor, and a 'Bling Thing' calculator. Additionally, Skin1004 is introducing a Zombie Pack, a mask designed to hydrate and rejuvenate skin.

articles.title: COSRX's Hottest New Launches Go on Sale for the First Time During U.S. Amazon Prime Day  Jul. 3, 2025 22:00
articles.summary: COSRX is offering discounts on its newest skincare and haircare products during Amazon Prime Day 2025, from July 8 to 11. The sale includes hero items like The Ceramide Skin Barrier Moisturizer, Airy-Light Clear Sunscreen Stick, Hydrogel Masks, and the newly launched Peptide-132 Damage Repair Haircare line, with discounts up to 30% off. The new Peptide-132 Haircare Collection, featuring a shampoo, treatment, and oil serum, utilizes bond-repair technology and is making its Prime Day debut.

articles.title: WhatsApp & Instagram Reels
articles.summary: Aggarwal Store is advertising a Whatsapp number for customers to order mini printers. Retailers are capitalizing on offering direct-to-consumer sales via Whatsapp. There are many mini printers models like HP Sprocket, Canon IVY Mini photo Printer, and Polaroid Hi-Print.

articles.title: One of Amazon's Bestselling Pressure Washers Is Over 40% Off Ahead of Prime Day, and Shoppers Say It's a 'Real Workhorse'
articles.author: Michael Charboneau
articles.summary: Karcher K1700 Pressure Washer is currently on sale for $130, which is a 43% discount from its original price of $230 in anticipation for Amazon Prime Day 2025. The pressure washer features a powerful electric motor, a 35-foot power cord, a 25-foot hose, and various attachments like a turbo nozzle and a soap nozzle.

articles.title: Luxe laundry: now even washing your clothes is elevated, as high-end fragrance brands like Le Labo have their own formulas, as do dermatologist Barbara Sturm and Kardashian matriarch, Kris Jenner
articles.author: Divia Harilela
articles.summary: Several brands like The Laundress, Le Labo Fragrances, Maison Francis Kurkdjian, Dedcool, Laverée, and Emerald Fresh are introducing new luxury laundry detergents. These updated formulas cater to modern consumers with specialized care for different fabrics, sophisticated scents developed by boutique perfumers, and chic packaging. Some examples are Emerald Fresh's scents evoking 'mother's embrace' and Laverée's scents evoking forests.

articles.title: New Look's £39.99 summer dress that's both dressy and casual
articles.author: Laura Fidler Reporter
articles.summary: New Look is offering the Light Pink Embroidered Lace Frill Sleeve Ruffle Mini Dress priced at £39.99, described as a dressy yet casual option with floral embroidery and lace detailing. Next features the Adrianna Papell Pink Bead Mesh Cocktail Dress, a more luxurious pink mini dress priced at £249, embroidered with beads and sequins.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Is Almost Here—Shop Early Deals On Tech, Home And More
articles.author: Jordan Thomas
articles.summary: Amazon is previewing early deals for Prime Day 2025, which runs from July 8th to July 11th. Featured products include TVs with AI Sports Mode, Wavytalk hair tools, Dyson V8 Plus stick vacuums, Yeti coolers, and Nespresso espresso machines, all offered at discounted prices. The event highlights savings across various categories such as beauty, tech, home goods, and outdoor gear.

articles.title: It's Hot AF—These Are the Skincare Products I'm Using to Keep Myself Cool
articles.author: Danielle Jackson
articles.summary: The article introduces several skincare products designed to provide a cooling sensation and relief from heat, including ice pods made with glycerin and niacinamide, cryotherapy ice globes, jelly masks, and freezable face masks. Serums, water-based moisturizers, LED masks with cooling technology, hyaluronic acid ampoule and jelly mask treatments, and mists containing ingredients like peppermint are also highlighted for their cooling and skin-soothing properties.

articles.title: Haier and Abenson unveil the future of home entertainment with the launch of the Haier Mini LED TV
articles.author: Inquirer.Net Brandroom
articles.summary: Haier Philippines, in partnership with Abenson, launched the Haier Mini LED TV. This TV features True Color Pro technology, ultra-fine contrast from mini LED backlighting, 4K HDR resolution, Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos, Game Mode Pro, and voice-activated controls. The Haier Mini LED TV is now available at Abenson stores and online.

articles.title: Our home editor found 13 early Amazon Prime Day deals on kitchen essentials — up to 45% off
articles.author: Amina Lake Patel
articles.summary: Several companies including De'Longhi, Ninja, Instant Pot, Vitamix, Lodge, Amazon Basics, Rubbermaid, Goodful, Primula, and Oxo are offering discounted prices on their kitchen products ahead of Prime Day. These deals include espresso machines, ice cream makers, pressure cookers, air fryers, blenders, cookware sets, and kitchen gadgets. The discounts represent an opportunity to purchase products at their lowest prices of the year.

articles.title: All the Baby Necessities This Editor Can't Live Without
articles.author: Rachel Silva
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new baby products focused on aesthetics and functionality. Nuna collaborates with BMW to release a new stroller, while Dagne Dover offers stylish diaper bags. Other new product releases or updates include bassinets from Design Dua and Babyletto, pacifier holders from Mushie, changing pads from Uniklook and Ava Oliver, beach toy sets from Moonkie, photo books from Artifact Uprising, bouncers from BabyBjörn, bath tubs from Lalo, towels from Crate & Barrel, loungers from Snuggle Me Organic, play kits from Lovevery, night lights and sound machines from Hatch, and stacking cups from Mushie.

articles.title: ‘It was the beginning of everything': Jordan Brand CMO Talks AJ1's Impact on Sneaker Culture
articles.summary: The Jordan Brand launched the "Unbannable" campaign to highlight the impact of the Air Jordan 1. This campaign included a social media blackout, banning Jordan 1s within NBA 2K25, and a commercial featuring athletes and entertainers to illustrate a world without the Air Jordan 1, emphasizing its legacy and influence on sneaker culture.

articles.title: Brain Defender Enters 2025 Cognitive Wellness Spotlight as Demand for Transparent, Non-Stimulant Support Surges
articles.author: Brain Defender
articles.summary: Brain Defender is positioning its cognitive support formula to align with transparency trends in the cognitive wellness category. The company has refined how its cognitive support product is represented in informational content. The public messaging reflects a commitment to clean, factual information about how it fits into modern conversations around memory health and cognitive resilience.

articles.title: Amazon Canada Prime Day Deals start July 8 — and now last 4 days. Here's a sneak peek to big product discounts from Dyson, Samsung, Adidas, Levi's, LEGO and more
articles.author: Itai Buenahora
articles.summary: Amazon Canada is launching an extended four-day Prime Day event from July 8 to July 11. The event will feature discounts on brands like Samsung, Adidas, Levi's, L'Oreal, Clinique and LEGO and a storefront for Canadian brands.

articles.title: Flower Delivery in Toronto: Seasonal Guide 2025
articles.summary: The article discusses the current landscape of flower delivery services, highlighting trends such as delivery tracking apps, augmented reality previews for bouquets, and eco-friendly practices. It also mentions Blooman as a relevant company in the industry.

articles.title: Moppet Foods sets record, launches on Walmart
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Moppet Foods, a Nigerian food provider, has launched its diverse product line, featuring Nutriblend. The product line is now available on Walmart.

articles.title: LazAI Launches LazPad Play-to-Launch Platform, Revolutionizing AI Agent Creation with Dynamic DATs
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: LazAI is launching LazPad, a platform designed for the launch and development of AI agents, utilizing dynamic Data Anchoring Tokens (DATs). The platform features curated and open launch zones, an exploration zone for interacting with unminted AI agents, and a DAT marketplace for trading and licensing these AI assets, including Companion DATs with unique personalities and stories.

articles.title: NxtQuantum Brings In India's First Home-grown Mobile OS With Focus On Data Integrity
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies has launched NxtQuantum OS, a new mobile operating system developed in India, prioritizing data control and transparency. Devices running the new OS will be available on Flipkart from 8 July at 12:30 PM IST. The OS is built on Google Cloud's zero-trust security architecture and aims to serve sectors such as defense, public services, and digital education initiatives.

articles.title: Dyson 4th of July limited time deal on V8 Absolute cordless vacuum, plus free shipping, is too good to miss
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a discount on its V8 Absolute vacuum, reducing the price from $519.99 to $349.99. The Dyson V8 Absolute cordless vacuum includes swappable heads and accessories, and the promotion offers a complimentary furniture cleaning kit and 20% off. The vacuum features a redesigned battery for up to 40 minutes of run time and includes multiple tools such as the Motorbar Cleaner Head and Fluffy Optic Cleaner Head.

articles.title: YC-backed Cekura plans to open office in India following $2 million fundraise
articles.summary: A startup offers a testing and observability layer for voice and chat AI. This service allows teams to simulate conversations at scale, monitor production calls, and generate actionable insights.

articles.title: The Prime Day Vacuum Sales Have Begun
articles.author: Erin Schwartz
articles.summary: During Amazon's Prime Day sales event, several vacuum cleaners from brands like Dyson, Bissell, Miele, Shark, Levoit, Roborock, and Dreame are available at discounted prices. Models such as the Dyson V8 and V11, Shark Stratos, and Dreame multi-function appliance are highlighted for their features and sale prices.

articles.title: LazAI Launches LazPad Play-to-Launch Platform, Revolutionizing AI Agent Creation with Dynamic DATs
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: LazAI has launched LazPad, a platform designed to reimagine AI agent launchpads. This platform introduces a co-creative ecosystem where AI agents are powered by dynamic Data Anchoring Tokens (DATs). LazPad enables users to shape AI agents through their interactions.

articles.title: Take up to 25% off Tuft and Needle mattresses during a rare 4th of July sale
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: Tuft & Needle is offering 25% off on their T&N Original Hybrid Mattress, which features bounce-back support, cooling fibers, and individually wrapped coils. Additionally, the T&N Original Mattress is discounted by 20% and aims to respond to pressure points with its cooling and adaptive foam design. Both mattresses are part of Tuft & Needle's 4th of July sale.

articles.title: Boost Your Skin Game: Top Men's Skincare from Myntra's Payday Party Sale
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra's Payday Party Sale features discounts on new skincare products, including Bath & Body Works Men Daily Face Wash, Deconstruct 10% Vitamin C Serum, Vaseline Lip Therapy Glossy Shine Original Care, and Foxtale SPF 50 Glow Sunscreen. Each product offers specific benefits like cleansing, brightening, hydration, and sun protection, respectively, catering to various skincare needs.

articles.title: Reviewers Say This Portable Ninja Works Better Than Professional-Grade Blenders — And It's 36% Off
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: The Ninja Blast portable cordless blender, an all-in-one device that's USB-C rechargeable is being introduced and it is available in several colors. The blender is suitable for protein shakes or fruit smoothies and is powerful enough to blend ice or other chunky ingredients.  It also features a self-clean mode and dishwasher-safe parts.

articles.title: Decoding Google's AI Mode: A Strategic Guide for Modern Marketers & SEOs
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: Google is evolving its search engine into an AI-powered assistant with the rollout of AI Mode in Search (via Search Generative Experience or SGE). Google's AI Mode uses generative AI to provide direct, synthesized answers. Guest post service plays a crucial role as Google still uses backlinks as a trust signal.

articles.title: My Hunt for a Just Grandmotherly Enough Nightgown
articles.author: Hannah Resnick
articles.summary: The author reviewed nightgowns from Slessic's 'Vintage' section, a two-piece with a mesh robe and slim-fitting slip, mentioning chest tightness and potential bridal use. The author also reviews the Hanro Juliet nightgown and praises its adjustable straps. Reformation launched its first-ever pajama dress with detailing, flattering fit, and a matching scrunchie.

articles.title: QVC slashes $49 off Ninja's viral ice cream maker - perfect for DELICIOUS homemade treats from sorbet to gelato and more
articles.author: JULIA REMILLARD
articles.summary: The Ninja Creami ice cream maker, launched in 2021, is currently on sale at QVC with a 20% discount and an additional discount using code WELCOME20, bringing the price down to $180. The Ninja Creami is equipped with seven different modes for making ice cream, gelato, milkshakes, and more, featuring a unique mix-in technology for creating customized flavors.

articles.title: Goldfish — yes, the snack — has opened a free car wash at the Jersey Shore
articles.author: Cherise Lynch
articles.summary: Goldfish has launched a free, limited-time car wash service at the Jersey Shore featuring orange suds and a custom Goldfish flavor mix station. Additionally, Goldfish has introduced limited-edition Crumb Camouflaging Car Mats, available at shop.goldfishsmiles.com.

articles.title: Households rush to buy mega pack of Lenor Outdoorable softener, reduced to just 4p per wash by major retailer
articles.author: SEO
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a discount on the Lenor Outdoorable Fabric Conditioner 480-wash mega pack, reducing the price from £40 to £23.80. This fabric conditioner is designed with SolarDry™ technology to replicate the freshness of outdoor drying and is available in 'Floral Fresh', 'Summer Breeze', and 'Spring Awakening' scents. Shoppers have praised Lenor Outdoorable for its long-lasting fragrance and gentle formula.

articles.title: 你知道，男人心目中'红颜知己'，是什么样子的吗？
articles.summary: The article lists multiple URLs which may indicate the introduction or launching of new products or services by companies. The mentioned domains include wan.trdmz.com, layui.trdmz.com, jiuba.trdmz.com, epm.trdmz.com, crm.trdmz.com and cloud.trdmz.com.

articles.title: Review of viral M&S Strawberries and Cream sandwich
articles.author:
Seth Dellow
        
Reporter
articles.summary: M&S launched a limited edition 'novelty sandwich' inspired by the Japanese fruit 'sando', featuring British Red Diamond strawberries and whipped cream cheese on sweetened bread. Due to its limited availability, the sandwich is experiencing high demand. However, reviews suggest that the taste is not impressive compared to the steep price of £2.80.

articles.title: Google AI mode debuts in India: A ChatGPT-like search experience powered by Gemini
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Google launched AI Mode in India, a conversational search upgrade that uses a customized version of the Gemini AI model. AI Mode, available through the Google app, offers features like Deep Search, Shopping Tools with virtual try-on, and real-time data visualization, designed to provide more intelligent and personalized search results.

articles.title: As AI agents gain autonomy, trust becomes the new currency. Mastercard wants to power both.
articles.author: Matthew Driver
articles.summary: Mastercard is launching Mastercard Agent Pay, a new service that integrates tokenization to enable secure AI agent transactions. This service uses Agentic Tokens to ensure traceable payment requests with predefined rules and permissions. The aim is to provide users with control over agent actions and to create a secure and trusted environment for AI-driven commerce.

articles.title: The Tineco Pure ONE Station 5 Vacuum Does the Dirty Work for You
articles.author: Robb Report Studio
articles.summary: Tineco introduces the Pure ONE Station 5, a vacuum featuring a smart dock for self-emptying, filter cleaning, and maintenance. It has an iLoop Smart Sensor to adjust suction based on real-time dust levels and operates quietly, offering up to 70 minutes of runtime. The new product positions itself as a superior alternative to Dyson V11.

articles.title: McDonald's adds Spicy McMuffin breakfast sandwiches to menu
articles.author: Alexa Mae Asperin
articles.summary: McDonald's is launching a new line of Spicy McMuffin breakfast sandwiches nationwide starting July 8 for a limited time. The new sandwiches come in three variations: the Spicy Egg McMuffin, the Spicy Sausage McMuffin, and the Spicy Sausage McMuffin with Egg, and feature McDonald's signature Spicy Pepper Sauce. The new sandwiches will use 100% cage-free eggs in the U.S.

articles.title: Amazon launches 'bazaar' – budget trend hub for UAE shoppers
articles.author: Sakina Fatima
articles.summary: Amazon UAE launched "bazaar," a new section in its mobile app offering low-cost products across fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. The platform focuses on affordability, with most items priced under Dirham 25, and includes discounts and free shipping options to attract budget-conscious shoppers.

articles.title: Aldi Just Dropped the Ultimate Laundry Must-Have for Just $12.99
articles.author: Mary Hawkins
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced a new collapsible laundry basket for $12.99, ideal for small spaces and organization. This product, along with other organizational items like mesh organizers and drawer organizers, is part of Aldi's new product line.

articles.title: Top 30 Walmart Items That Make Life Easier
articles.author: Yi Yang
articles.summary: The article highlights a range of new products designed to solve everyday problems and enhance various aspects of life, including household chores, personal care, and plant maintenance. These products, such as fertilizer spikes, motion sensor lights, sunscreen sticks, cleaning solutions, and organizers, are available for purchase and aim to provide convenience and effectiveness in addressing specific needs. The article also refers to Walmart's grocery selection to get veggies, meat, seafood, and more delivered right to your door.

articles.title: Xpeng launches G7, a new Tesla Model Y competitor for just $27,000
articles.author: Fred Lambert
articles.summary: Xpeng has launched its new G7 electric SUV in China, starting at 195,800 yuan ($27,325 USD). The G7 offers features like Xpeng's 5C charging technology allowing up to 436 km of range in 10 minutes, an 87-inch AR-HUD, and an AI-driven suspension system.

articles.title: Amazon Bazaar launches in the UAE: 15-min deliveries, Dh1 deals, and exclusive discounts
articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Amazon Bazaar in the UAE, a mobile-only section within the Amazon.ae app, which offers affordable products across fashion, home goods, and lifestyle items. It features deals under Dh25, fast 15-minute delivery on selected products, volume discounts, and free shipping for orders above Dh90 and free 15-day returns on most products.

articles.title: Nigerian baby food penetrates top US retail storeFounder
articles.author: Premium Times
articles.summary: Moppets baby food has entered Walmart, a top US retail store. This signifies the introduction or launch of Moppets into a major US market.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025: Best early deals on tech, beauty and more
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Amazon is holding its Prime Day sale from July 8-11, offering discounts on a variety of products. Early deals are already available, including reduced prices on Soundcore by Anker Headphones (now £54.99), roborock Qrevo S Robot Vacuum Cleaner (now £419.99), and other tech, beauty, and gardening items. Amazon Prime members can benefit from these deals, along with perks such as next-day delivery and access to Prime Video and Prime Music.

articles.title: Integris Debuts New Brand with the Launch of M365 Security & Compliance Assessment
articles.author: INTEGRIS
articles.summary: Integris launched its newly reimagined website as part of a brand refresh. The updated messaging focuses on highly regulated small and midsized businesses, premium content, and a modern design embodying their future-ready mission. This reflects Integris' commitment to innovation and becoming an MSP of the future.

articles.title: COSRX's Hottest New Launches Go on Sale for the First Time During U.S. Amazon Prime Day
articles.author: COSRX
articles.summary: K-beauty brand COSRX will offer discounts up to 30% on new skincare and haircare launches during Amazon Prime Day 2025, from July 8 to 11. The promotion includes hero items like The Ceramide Skin Barrier Moisturizer, Airy-Light Clear Sunscreen Stick, The Peptide Collagen Lifting Glow Hydrogel Mask, The Alpha Arbutin Discoloration Care Hydrogel Mask, and the Peptide-132 Damage Repair Haircare line.

articles.title: New app looks to the future, while still embracing the heart of the wholesale market
articles.summary: Bevington Salads launched En Route Fruit in January, a new e-commerce platform aimed at restaurants, retailers, and supermarkets. This platform allows for online ordering of fresh fruit, vegetables, salads, and herbs via app, social media, or phone, combining industry expertise with e-commerce technology.

articles.title: Say hello to Central Ohio's first ‘dirty soda'-dedicated food truck
articles.author: Jack McLaughlin
articles.summary: What the Fizz, a new food truck business specializing in dirty sodas, dirty energy drinks, and lemonade shakeups, launched in May. The company, founded by three sisters, offers a variety of flavored sodas, energy drinks, and lemonade, and travels between Mansfield, Mount Vernon, and Columbus.

articles.title: Save 44% off this XL Ninja Air Fryer ahead of Prime Day on Amazon
articles.author: P.J. McCormick
articles.summary: Ninja is offering its Air Fryer XL at a 44% discount before Amazon Prime Day. The Ninja Air Fryer XL features 5-in-1 functionality with air fry, roast, broil, bake, reheat, and dehydrate functions. The air fryer delivers fast, even cooking with a spacious 5.5‑quart basket and 1,750 W of power.

articles.title: India's ‘First' Mobile Operating System, NxtQuantum OS, Launched
articles.author: Shubham Verma
org: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
articles.summary: NxtQuantum Technologies launched NxtQuantum OS, a new mobile operating system focused on user privacy and control, built on Android 15. The OS will debut on NxtQuantum's AI+ Nova 5G and AI+ Pulse smartphones and store user data on Google Cloud servers located in India.

articles.title: Baidu shows off search with AI revamp, image-to-video model MuseSteamer
articles.summary: Baidu has revamped its Search with new AI features and launched its image-to-video model MuseSteamer. The upgraded Smart Search Box supports long-form queries and integrates directly with AI tools for writing, image generation while MuseSteamer enables video generation featuring synchronized visuals, sound effects, and dialogue. The Turbo version of MuseSteamer is currently available for limited-time free public testing.

articles.title: Shoppers snap up £80 off Vax that makes carpets 'look like new'
articles.author: Rachael Davis Features Writer
articles.summary: Vax Platinum Power Max Carpet Cleaner is available on Amazon for £169, reduced from £249.99, and cleans five times better than a high-performance vacuum cleaner. Daewoo Hurricane 650W 1.4L Spot Washer is available for £69 from George at Asda. Argos also has the Henry Wash Cylinder Carpet Cleaner for £200, down from £250.

articles.title: Amazon 4th of July sale: Shop the best deals on Dyson, Apple and more
articles.author: Mili Godio
articles.summary: Amazon is offering discounts on various products for the Fourth of July, with deals expected to extend through the weekend. Featured products include Dyson cordless stick vacuums, Apple AirPods Pro 2, Ring doorbells, Shark mist fans, Samsonite luggage, and Teva sandals, among others. The discounts are part of a broader sales event that may include early Prime Day deals.

articles.title: Virgin Media is giving away free smart TVs in summer sale
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Virgin Media is offering a free 50" Hisense Ultra HD Smart TV or £200 bill credit to new customers who sign up for select broadband and TV bundles. The offer includes several bundles, such as the Bigger Combo bundle + Movies at £44.99 per month, and the Mega Volt bundle at £84.99 a month, each with varying broadband speeds, TV channels, and additional services like Netflix and O2 SIM cards.

articles.title: vivo foldable phone flipkart
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Vivo is preparing to launch the Vivo X Fold 5, a new foldable flagship phone.

articles.title: Your ultimate 2025 guide to buying the perfect mattress in Canada
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: Several companies, including Silk & Snow, Zinus, Helix, Brooklyn Bedding, Leesa, Newton Baby, Article, Tempur-Pedic, and Endy, have introduced new mattresses and sofa beds with various features.  These products cater to different needs, such as organic materials, cooling technology, motion isolation, and specific sleeping positions. The products include free trials, warranties, and offers such as pillows and bundles to enhance customer experience.

articles.title: Boots opens brand new store in Glasgow Central Station
articles.author: Amy Myles
articles.summary: Boots has opened a new store in Glasgow Central Station, offering health, wellness, and beauty products. The store provides NHS Pharmacy First Scotland services. The new branch provides food, drinks, toiletries and everyday items from popular beauty brands such as No7, Soap & Glory, and Boots' own label.

articles.title: Agentic AI: Eval Infrastructure First for Trust & Confidence
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Rocket Companies experienced a threefold increase in website conversion rates through the use of conversational AI agents. Genesys is championing autonomous AI agents that can handle complex tasks across organizations, aiming to revolutionize customer service by reducing reliance on human representatives and transforming the future of customer experience.

articles.title: 'Stunning' New Look dress that has 25% off 'makes your waist look tiny'
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: New Look is offering its Red Square Neck Crepe Midi Dress on sale for £34.49, praised for its flattering design and vibrant color. Nobody's Child has a versatile midi dress in its Vera frock on sale for £55.25, made from organic cotton and featuring a jersey-style top. Topshop's drop waist ruched maxi dress in red is on sale for £11.50, offering a flattering silhouette.

articles.title: Jurny and Visual Matrix team up to integrate AI tools into hotel operations
articles.author: Global Data
articles.summary: Jurny and Visual Matrix are partnering to offer a fully integrated guest experience platform. This integration introduces AI-powered tools like contactless mobile check-in/checkout, identity verification, real-time guest messaging, and automated upsells within the Visual Matrix PMS environment, leveraging Jurny's AI Multi-Agent system.

articles.title: Baidu revamps search engine in bid to stay ahead of DeepSeek
articles.author: Shunsuke Tabeta
articles.summary: Baidu, a Chinese internet giant, announced a major overhaul of its core search engine. The update increases the character limit in the search box to over 1,000 characters, enabling users to input full-length queries and receive generative AI chat app-like responses. This enhancement is part of Baidu's strategy to integrate generative AI more deeply into its platform.

articles.title: Madhav Sheth's NxtQuantum aims to build a global brand from India, starts with affordable AI+ smartphones
articles.author: Charu Lamba
articles.summary: NxtQuantum is launching AI+ smartphones in India, introducing models Pulse and Nova 5G. The products are priced starting from Rs 5,000 and will be available through direct-to-retail, online exclusives like Flipkart, and the company's own website. They also intend to launch other ecosystem products.

articles.title: The Dish: A spicy breakfast sandwich East Dallas can't get enough of
articles.author: Claire Ballor
articles.summary: Goodfriend Package introduced the Snakebite breakfast sandwich, featuring jalapeño cheddar bagels from Starship, raspberry jam, spicy cream cheese, breakfast sausage, jalapeños, American cheese, egg, and bacon. Due to its popularity, the Snakebite is likely to become a permanent menu item at Goodfriend Package.

articles.title: Experts Launch Auqli Platform To Drive Nigerias E-Commerce Growth
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Auqli, a new video commerce platform, has been launched in Nigeria. Developed by local and international partners, Auqli is designed as a live shopping and shoppable video platform to address challenges like buyer skepticism and failed deliveries.

articles.title: ChatGPT: Don't Miss the Train
articles.summary: ChatGPT, a groundbreaking AI chatbot, assists users with research, content creation, and coding. It is being utilized across industries like marketing, customer service, and education and can be integrated with platforms like WhatsApp, enabling quick access to its AI capabilities for daily communication.

articles.title: Strada Marketing: Michel & Augustin's Street Strategy
articles.summary: Michel Et Augustin launched a new savory cookie using a street marketing campaign executed by Strada Marketing. The campaign involves tasting sessions in major French cities using branded scooters to distribute samples. This experiential marketing approach aims to generate buzz, strengthen brand image, and directly engage with consumers.

articles.title: MOTORING REVIEW:  BYD expands Irish range with Sealion 7
articles.summary: BYD launched the Sealion 7 in April, marking the Chinese brand's fifth model in two years in Ireland. The Sealion 7 is a mid-sized electric SUV with a sleek design and features BYD's Blade Batteries, offering a range of up to 502km. Prices range from €45,435 to €56,490 after state subsidies.

articles.title: OnePlus Buds 4 to debut with Nord 5, Nord CE 5: Launch timeline, features and more
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the Buds 4 wireless earphones in India on July 8th. The Buds 4 feature dual drivers, dual DACs, 3D Audio, LHDC 5.0, and a 47ms low-latency Game Mode, with up to 45 hours of battery life with the charging case. It has Zen Green and Storm Grey colors.

articles.title: Opening date set for Now to Bed's Rhuddlan ‘flagship store'
articles.author: Matthew Chandler
articles.summary: Now to Bed is opening a new store at Castle View Retail Park on July 26th at 10 am. The store will feature a large display of beds and mattresses, with mattresses starting from £199, and offer a 10% discount with the code FB10. This grand opening marks a new chapter for the company and offers customers the opportunity to explore exclusive collections and receive expert advice on choosing the perfect bed.

articles.title: First shipment of Changan models arrives in South Africa - here's what to expect
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Changan is set to launch four new models in South Africa before the end of 2025, including the Hunter bakkie, Alsvin sedan, Deepal S07 electric crossover, and CS75 compact SUV. The first batch of vehicles has already arrived in South Africa and are undergoing homologation process. These new models, distributed by Jameel Motors, aim to provide exceptional value and advanced mobility to South African drivers.

articles.title: HKEX launches order routing service to boost fund market connectivity
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing (0388) has launched a new order messaging service.

articles.title: Don't let hype about AI agents get ahead of reality
articles.author: Yoav Shoham
articles.summary: Google introduced Agent-to-Agent (A2A), an open standard protocol for intelligent agents from different companies to communicate and collaborate. AI21 Labs launched Maestro, a system designed for enterprise reliability by combining LLMs with company data. The goal is to create intelligent software agents capable of automating tasks and interacting with each other to improve digital workflows.

articles.title: 15-min delivery, items for Dh1: Amazon Bazaar launches in UAE
articles.author: Laraib Anwer
articles.summary: Amazon has launched 'Amazon Bazaar', a new section in their app exclusively for UAE shoppers, offering affordable products starting from Dh1. The company is offering a 25% discount during the first month, along with free shipping on orders over Dh90 and a 15-minute delivery option on select items.

articles.title: Moppet becomes first Nigerian baby food brand to launch at Walmart USA
articles.author: 'Sola Richards
articles.summary: Moppet Foods has launched its product line, including Nutriblend, on Walmart, marking the company as the first Nigerian children's food brand with natural ingredients to be distributed by Walmart USA. This partnership aims to expand Moppet Foods' reach to a broader consumer base and make its nutritious food solutions more accessible.

articles.title: Samsung's Affordable Galaxy Z Flip FE Model Launching Next Week? Here's What We Know
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, and Galaxy Watch 8 series at an event in New York. There are also rumors of an affordable Z Flip 7 FE model and a possible teaser for a tri-fold device. The event is scheduled for July 9.

articles.title: WhatsApp Offers AI And Calling Support For Brands To Reach More Users: What It Means ...
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: WhatsApp chat app now supports AI features and document scanning. Brands will soon connect with users and share ads within the platform, indicating updates to the service.

articles.title: Japan beef bowl chain Yoshinoya launches first-ever noodle dish in 125-year history
articles.author: Mainichi Japan
articles.summary: Yoshinoya Co. is launching its first-ever noodle menu item, "gyutama stamina mazesoba," at all stores across Japan starting July 4th. This cold noodle dish, priced at 767 yen for dining in and 753 yen for takeout, is designed to be a refreshing summer offering topped with simmered beef and onions, egg, and green onions.

articles.title: I went hands-on with LG's coffee-making robot — here's what happened
articles.author: Millie Fender
articles.summary: LG's Duobo is a Nespresso-brewing gadget available in South Korea. The machine holds two Nespresso capsules at once for customized flavors and features an integrated full HD IPS display with animations and coffee tips.

articles.title: Tried and tested: the world's most powerful cordless stick vacuum cleaner
articles.author: Megan Burns
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Bespoke AI Jet Ultra, a cordless stick vacuum cleaner boasting 400W of suction power and a Clean Station for self-emptying and charging. The vacuum features AI Cleaning mode, multiple brushes for various surfaces, and a multi-layered filtration system.

articles.title: Wadiz announced that it has launched an AI (artificial intelligence) agent dedicated to crowdfunding..
articles.author: Lee Young-Wook
articles.summary: Wadiz has launched "WAi," an AI agent for crowdfunding. This service answers questions about funding projects and provides real-time feedback to makers, using interactive AI learned from Wadiz resources. Wadiz plans to expand WAi's capabilities for global users and offer customized answers and guide questions.

articles.title: Pjur Lubricant: Rewriting Global Intimacy
articles.summary: Pjur, founded in 1995, introduced Pjur Original, the world's first bottled silicone lubricant, and continues to develop new products. Their product line includes Pjur Aqua, a water-based lubricant, and Pjur Back Door, a silicone lubricant designed for anal play, all manufactured in Germany adhering to EU standards.

articles.title: Next's 'flattering' £28 summer dress perfect for holidays
articles.author: Katie Timms
articles.summary: Next is offering a new £28 slip dress in five patterns, available in sizes 6-22. New Look has a Chiffon Strappy Midi Dress discounted to £28.49, and Bershka offers a Cross Back Midaxi Slip Dress for £21 on ASOS.

articles.title: Next's 'flattering' £28 summer dress in five patterns perfect for holidays
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Next is offering a new £28 slip dress in five patterns, designed for the summer season. The dress is available in sizes 6 to 22 and features adjustable straps and a side split hem. Online reviews indicate positive customer feedback regarding its comfort and flattering fit.

articles.title: Nestle India shares in focus after new Maggi noodles line added at Sanand plant
articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.summary: Nestlé India announced a new Maggi noodles production line at its Sanand facility in Gujarat with an investment of Rs 105 crore. This new line will increase capacity by approximately 20,300 tonnes per annum in FY26, which is part of Nestlé India's broader capital expenditure plan.

articles.title: Sit back and enjoy the space and quality of the Toyota Land Cruiser
articles.author: Sponsored
articles.summary: Toyota has launched a new Land Cruiser model, featuring a retro exterior design and advanced technology. The new model boasts improvements in on-road performance with electric power steering, a more powerful 2.8-liter turbodiesel engine, enhanced safety features through Toyota Safety Sense, and an upgraded interior with a touchscreen and improved materials. The car retains its off-road capabilities with accessible four-low and four-high ratios.

articles.title: Motorola G96 5G specifications leaked: Check out the expected features, price, launch date, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the G96 5G smartphone in India on July 9. The phone features a 6.67" curved pOLED display, a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chip, a 50MP Sony camera, a 5,500 mAh battery with 68W fast charging and it is expected to be priced around ₹20,000.

articles.title: OPPO Reno 14 5G, OPPO Reno 14 Pro 5G Launch Live Streaming: Watch Online Telecast of Launch of New OPPO Smartphones; Know Price, Specifications and Other Details
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: OPPO is launching the OPPO Reno 14 series 5G smartphones (OPPO Reno 14 5G and OPPO Reno 14 Pro 5G) and the OPPO Pad SE tablet in India. The Reno 14 series features MediaTek Dimensity chipsets and large batteries with fast charging, while the OPPO Pad SE is expected to be priced around INR 11,000.

articles.title: 2025 BMW 118 Sport Collection brings extra value
articles.author: Marton Pettendy
articles.summary: CarExpert is offering hundreds of deals on new cars. The service aims to help customers find great deals on new vehicles through expert guidance.

articles.title: Campaign Dive: Arindam Varanasi on Somersby's ‘No Nonsense' Approach to Young Adults
articles.author: McGill
articles.summary: Somersby, part of the Carlsberg Group, launched a new campaign in Asia, introducing YEONJUN of TXT as its brand ambassador. The campaign introduces a 'No Nonsense' platform. Somersby also introduced new flavors like Pineapple & Lime and Passionfruit & Orange.

articles.title: What to expect as Huawei and Samsung set to launch new smartphones
articles.author: Faizel Patel
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its new Galaxy Z Fold 7 smartphone, previewed at an event in South Africa. Huawei unveiled its Pura 80 series, with an official launch expected in Dubai on July 10th. Both companies are focusing on innovation and AI technology in their new devices, while also addressing the mid-range market with more affordable options.

articles.title: Lawaken Bets on AI Glasses for the Post-ChatGPT Era-钛媒体官方网站
articles.summary: Lawaken launched 'Chat' in 2024, its first AI-powered glasses based on its proprietary WAKE-AI model, targeting Chinese businesspeople going abroad. In 2025, Lawaken launched 'City Air', a new model featuring live audio translation, real-time subtitling, hands-free video capture, and navigation support integrated with a cloud agent.

articles.title: 26 Affordable Target Products For Apartment Living
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: The article highlights several new products designed to enhance apartment living. These include storage solutions, organizers, and home improvement items, each offering unique features and benefits. The products range from showerheads to organizers, lighting, and kitchenware, all designed to make apartment life more organized and stylish.

articles.title: The new Nieddittas store opens in Arzachena
articles.summary: Nieddittas has opened a new store in Arzachena, Sardinia, offering fresh seafood products, including mussels, clams, oysters, and local fish. The store also provides ready-to-take dishes like seafood salad and fried fish, along with home delivery services.

articles.title: Baidu Huixiang-AI: Video Creation & AI Tools
articles.summary: Baidu has launched Huixiang, an AI platform designed to streamline video creation for both individuals and businesses. Furthermore, Baidu introduced MuseSteamer, an AI video generation model designed for enterprise users, that aims to push the boundaries of AI-driven video creation from still images. These platforms offer features such as AI-driven video generation, inspiration recommendations, and one-click style replication.

articles.title: TT Chamber CEO: Celebrating Caribbean innovation
articles.author: Newsday
articles.summary: The TT Chamber, in partnership with Kotler Impact Inc, is launching the 'Essentials of Modern Marketing – Caribbean Edition'. This initiative will document and broadcast Caribbean business success stories to a global audience via a prestigious publication and accompanying videos. The project aims to increase the global visibility of Caribbean firms and position them as leaders in the marketing field.

articles.title: 30 Products With Rave Reviews From People Over 50
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The content introduces a variety of new consumer products across different categories. It includes a teeth-whitening pen, a skin-tightening cream, compression gloves and socks, and a Verb hair oil. Also featured are a Schick dermaplaning razor pack and Embryolisse moisturizing cream, among other diverse items, all recently available to consumers.

articles.title: Look out, Lexus! Zeekr could offer Australia's most sumptuous people mover
articles.author: Josh Nevett
articles.summary: A company executive, Mr. Zhou, mentioned plans to introduce a new model next year. This new model, alongside existing versions like 'X' and '7X', raises concerns about showroom space.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025: Best early vacuum cleaner deals
articles.author: Tahnee-Jaea Lopez-Vito
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a 46% discount on its V10 Cyclone Vacuum, now priced at $595. Lefant's Robot Vacuum Cleaner has a 63% discount, costing $149. Bissell's Featherweight 2024 Bagless Stick Vacuum is available for $79 during Amazon Prime Day.

articles.title: The Meat Box Continues To Grow — And Deliver More To Kiwi Households
articles.author: Stats Nz
articles.summary: The Meat Box is expanding its product range through a partnership with Neat Meat. This includes offering premium meat options such as Wagyu, SpeckleBeef, and Duck, as well as fresh fish, heat-and-eat options, and complimentary groceries like fresh fruit and vegetables. The expansion aims to provide consumers with a broader selection and convenient access to restaurant-quality meat and related products.

articles.title: Olive by Embassy launches AI-native hotel brand
articles.author: DHNS
articles.summary: Open Hotels is launching its new tech stack service. The company previously tested the service at its Olive hotels.

articles.title: LazPad Launches Play-to-Launch Platform, Revolutionizing AI Agent Creation with Dynamic DATs
articles.summary: LazAI has launched LazPad, a platform for creating and interacting with AI agents. LazPad uses Data Anchoring Tokens (DATs) and offers features like the DAT Marketplace where users can trade and build AI assets and Companion DATs, digital creatures that evolve through user interaction. This launch aims to create a decentralized emotional data economy through user-driven AI development.

articles.title: Save your bucks on Amazon Prime Day with these 7 best brands
articles.author: Belad Al-Karkhey
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day features potential deals on products from several companies.  Breville offers discounted espresso machines and kitchen appliances. Dyson provides deals on vacuum cleaners and hair dryers. Sony includes deals on headphones, soundbars, TVs and cameras. Bosch offers deals on power tools. Apple offers deals on devices. Panasonic offers deals on microwaves and hair care products. Adidas offers deals on apparel and accessories. L'Oréal Paris includes deals on beauty products.

articles.title: Motorola launches its most intelligent smartphones yet - the motorola razr 60 and motorola edge 60 pro
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Motorola is launching two new smartphones in Australia: the motorola razr 60 and the motorola edge 60 pro, both equipped with moto ai. The motorola razr 60 features a redesigned, more durable flip design and advanced camera features, while the motorola edge 60 pro boasts a large battery, AI-enhanced display, and military-grade durability. Both devices will be available from July 10th.

articles.title: Qlean Declares War on Liquid Laundry: The Bioenzyme Revolution Begins
articles.summary: Qlean has launched Qlean Detergent Sheets, an eco-friendly laundry solution powered by bioenzymes. These sheets eliminate plastic waste and toxic chemicals, offering a sustainable alternative to traditional liquid detergents. Qlean replaces plastic jugs with compact boxes, reducing shipping emissions and environmental impact.

articles.title: 35 "Miracle" Products For Annoying Human Body Things
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Olay is introducing Super Serum Body Wash, packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration. Neutrogena launches Ultra Sheer Moisturizing Face SPF 60 Serum, a priming moisturizer with UV protection. First Aid Beauty releases KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant, targeting rough patches and dry bumps on the skin.

articles.title: AI-backed brand analytics platform GobbleCube raises $3.5 million in round led by InfoEdge Ventures
articles.summary: GobbleCube, an AI-backed consumer brand analytics platform, raised $3.5 million in funding. This platform helps brands scale by identifying revenue leaks, demand gaps and high-growth micro-markets. GobbleCube plans to deepen its AI capabilities and expand platform coverage using the new capital.

articles.title: Let's Test a Mr Robot Attack on the New Thunderbird for Mobile
articles.author: Donna Hancock
articles.summary: Thunderbird released a new mobile version of their email client, Thunderbird for Mobile, making the email client accessible across all platforms.

articles.title: Lower consumption, fewer emissions, quieter ride: New e-POWER is a game-changing technology
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Nissan is launching the most advanced form of its e-POWER technology, nearly a decade after its global debut. This represents an update to an existing product line.

articles.title: Oppo Reno 14 series India launch today at 12PM: Expected price, specs and everything else
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Oppo is launching its Reno series in India. The launch event includes details on expected prices and specifications for the new product line.

articles.title: Working with clients for alternative engagement models, says DreamFolks promoter Liberatha Kallat
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: The company is exploring alternative engagement models. It is leveraging its existing and new service offerings and products outside the airport.

articles.title: Oppo Pad SE launched, brings big screen and 9340mAh battery for Rs 13,999
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Oppo launched the Oppo Pad SE. The Oppo Pad SE features a large screen and a large mAh battery.

articles.title: Take On Summer With These Lululemon New Arrivals
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Lululemon is offering their latest products and colorways for both men and women.

articles.title: Food delivery workers to go on token strike
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: Zomato launched 'Select to Go', a new service. Agents are demanding the removal of Zomato's new service.

articles.title: Avail Rolls Out Interoperability Protocol to Link ZK and OP Rollups
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Avail Nexus introduces cross-chain interoperability by uniting ZK rollups, optimistic rollups, and sovereign chains. The Nexus SDK enables developers to deploy once and scale everywhere, supporting various functionalities like ZK proofs and secure hardware flows.

articles.title: Oppo Pad SE Android tablet under ₹15,000 launched in India: Specs and details
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Oppo launched the Oppo Pad SE Android tablet in India. The tablet features an 11-inch display, a 9,340mAh battery, and runs Android 15 with ColorOS 15.0.1.

articles.title: Matter Motor Works plans to launch one electric bike annually over next 3 yrs
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: An Ahmedabad-based company launched its geared electric product on Thursday.

articles.title: ‘This £3 hair mask gives my blonde hair a salon-like tone in a matter of minutes'
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Hask launched a new blonde hair care line. Shopping Writer Meghan tested the new hair care line. Meghan was impressed by the results of testing the new line.

articles.title: Fresh burger ideas for your next cookout
articles.summary: Gelson's is providing a variety of fresh burger ideas for the grilling season. Their offerings encompass burgers, spice blends, and sauces.
